title: Qualitative set crime rates - conclusions of study

content.question: Which of the following conclusions is correct based on the overall results of this study?

choices.label: Participants expected the actual crime rate to remain relatively stable over the length of the study.
Participants mostly perceived the crime rate to be higher than it was.
Participantsâ€™ predictions accurately tracked the actual crime rate.
Participants believed that the crime rate decreased slowly over the length of the study.

content.answer: Participants mostly perceived the crime rate to be higher than it was.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
